name: Alexandria
relicBonuses: At the start of the bearer's turn (other than its first turn), this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy for every 2 turns the bearer has taken in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer have 10% more {STAT_attack} for each turn the bearer has taken in the current battle.
At the end of each creature's turn, this relic has a 5% chance to {ACTION_cast} [icons,1984]Timewalk on the bearer.
This relic and its bearer have 10% more {STAT_intelligence} for each turn the bearer has taken in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer deal 15% more damage for each turn the bearer has taken in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer have 10% more {STAT_defense} for each turn the bearer has taken in the current battle.
The bearer takes 10% less damage for each turn it has taken in the current battle.
This relic and its bearer have 10% more {STAT_speed} for each turn the bearer has taken in the current battle.
At the end of the bearer's turn (other than its first turn), this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1984]Death Blossom.
The bearer takes 2 turns at a time.
title: God of Falsity
